statements: SELECT * FROM performance_tracking;
SELECT channel_name, campaign_name, clicks FROM performance_tracking WHERE conversions > 5;
SELECT channel_name, campaign_name, revenue FROM performance_tracking WHERE clicks >= 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_channels WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, channel_name, monthly_budget FROM marketing_channels ORDER BY monthly_budget DESC, channel_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_tracking WHERE revenue > 1000
SELECT channel_name, campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM performance_tracking WHERE conversions > 5 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT channel_name, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM performance_tracking GROUP BY channel_name HAVING total_clicks > 500
SELECT pt.channel_name, SUM(pt.revenue) AS total_revenue, mc.monthly_budget FROM performance_tracking pt JOIN marketing_channels mc ON pt.channel_name = mc.channel_name GROUP BY pt.channel_name

SELECT pt.channel_name, mc.channel_name AS marketing_channel, pt.revenue, mc.monthly_budget, mc.start_date FROM performance_tracking pt LEFT JOIN marketing_channels mc ON pt.channel_name = mc.channel_name WHERE pt.revenue > 50000
SELECT * FROM marketing_channels;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM marketing_channels ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE channel_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT mc.channel_name, mcam.campaign_name, mcam.start_date FROM marketing_channels mc JOIN marketing_campaigns mcam ON mc.channel_id = mcam.channel_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns, channel_name FROM marketing_campaigns mc JOIN marketing_channels mch ON mc.channel_id = mch.channel_id GROUP BY channel_name ORDER BY total_campaigns DESC;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketing_channels;
SELECT channel_id, channel_name, signup_date FROM affiliate_marketing_channels WHERE partner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, date, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT channel_name, partner_id FROM affiliate_marketing_channels ORDER BY channel_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketing_channels ORDER BY signup_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT channel_name, partner_id, COUNT(*) as total_channels FROM affiliate_marketing_channels GROUP BY channel_name, partner_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, campaign_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, date, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM campaign_performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND clicks > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;

SELECT c.campaign_name, cp.date, cp.clicks, cp.conversions FROM marketing_campaigns c INNER JOIN campaign_performance cp ON c.campaign_id = cp.campaign_id WHERE cp.revenue > 1000 ORDER BY cp.date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_channels;
SELECT channel_name, channel_description FROM marketing_channels WHERE channel_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE channel_id = 2;
SELECT performance_id, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM campaign_costs WHERE cost_type = 'advertising';
SELECT * FROM marketing_channels;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE channel_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM campaign_performance WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, cost FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_costs ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_costs.campaign_id WHERE cost_type = 'advertising';
SELECT channel_name, channel_description FROM marketing_channels ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_channels;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM marketing_channels WHERE channel_type = 'Social Media';
SELECT partner_name FROM affiliate_partners ORDER BY partner_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT click_time, channel_id, partner_id FROM clicks WHERE channel_id = 3 ORDER BY click_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_channels WHERE channel_type = 'Online';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT partner_name, partner_type FROM affiliate_partners ORDER BY partner_name ASC;

SELECT c.channel_name, a.partner_name, co.conversion_value FROM marketing_channels c JOIN clicks cl ON c.channel_id = cl.channel_id JOIN conversions co ON cl.click_id = co.click_id JOIN affiliate_partners a ON cl.partner_id = a.partner_id;

SELECT cl.click_time, ca.campaign_name, ap.partner_name FROM clicks cl JOIN campaigns ca ON cl.campaign_id = ca.campaign_id JOIN affiliate_partners ap ON cl.partner_id = ap.partner_id WHERE ca.start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
